review.title: fairly close to the airport
review.reviewText: terrible reception from the woman who checked us in.not friendly and very rude. English not very clear.
review.positiveRemarks: clean and good bed
review.negativeRemarks: needs updating and too expensive for what you got. change the staff on reception !!!
review.locationRemarks: 40 min bus ride to centre of san Francisco and very cheap bus fare and this stops practically outside the hotel

review.title: Nice hotel closet airport
review.reviewText: The hotel was small but conveniently located near the airport (10-minute drive). The guy on the hotel front desk was extremely helpful concerning restaurants within walking distance and he stressed that the area was safe. The room was nice. My only regret was that there seemed to be no elevator to help me move my suitcase to the second floor. But this was not much of a problem so I overlooked it. The wake-up call and the taxi I wanted arrived on time, which was perfect as I had a 6:45 a.m. flight.
review.positiveRemarks: See above.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing really.
review.locationRemarks: The point of the hotel is that it was fairly close to the airport. There was nothing much to do except visit the nearby restaurants.

review.title: Nice hotel outside San Francisco.
review.reviewText: Very clean comfy beds just what we needed after a long drive. Staff very helpful

review.title: Last stop before hime
review.reviewText: We needed a hotel close to SFO for our return flight and this was ideal. I don't think I'd use it for anything else but it suited our purpose was clean and comfortable.

review.title: Clean. Near airport
review.reviewText: Very small room, but very clean and quiet. Registration was quick and friendly.

review.title: Great location and great place to stay
review.reviewText: Great location and great place to stay, would def recommend and come back to.  I Was here with my wife for a week long vacation. Very convient also loacation for early morning flights.

review.title: Great and not just for the price
review.reviewText:
We took our 2 yr old son to SF for his BDay and the hotels in the city were crazy expensive. We went to a Giants game the first day, then stayed at this hotel, then took him to the zoo the next day. The location of this hotel was perfect. We went to dinner in Burlingame which is pretty close and it was great.
Check-in was fast and easy and the room was the cleanest hotel room I have seen in a long time. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
My only complaint was with breakfast. I wasn't even going to have any of the complimentary breakfast because it seemed like it was just sugary cereal, but went to check it out anyway. I got some cereal for my son and realized after giving him two bites that the milk was spoiled. It was gross. Coffee was not good, especially since they only had sweetened creamer, plus the coffee itself tasted old as well. Next time I won't even try with the breakfast but everything else was great.

review.title: Unexpectedly great!
review.reviewText: I didn't expect much because it's a 1.5 star hotel. I made a reservation for jacuzzi. It was so great! It deserves more than 1.5 star...
review.positiveRemarks: New, clean, friendly

review.title: Great little hotel
review.reviewText: We needed one night close to the airport...this was perfect. Grand St is just a few blocks away, within walking distance where you'll find tons of restaurants and a cute little downtown. Our room was spotless and well cared for. Comfortable bed too...  The hotel is small and well looked after by the family who runs it. They are very friendly and eager to help any way they can.

review.title: Do not believe trip advisor review on this hotel!!
review.reviewText:
Worst stay of my life!
Room smells old and damp.
Towels are worn out very bad and dirty.
Also feels creepy like never been washed and only dried over and over again.
Some towels got very darker color.
Asked for new towels and refused because they said they are washing towels.
I found bed bug right after I got a bite on right wrist early evening.
My wife got very stressed out and we couldn't use pillow or bed cover scared of bed bug.
Feels very betrayed because I chose this hotel on trip advisors good reviews.
I strongly believe they are fabricated somehow.
I am not gonna trust trip advisors review anymore.
Stay away of this hotel!!!

review.title: Nice and quaint!!!
review.reviewText: Cute place!!  Would stay again.  Only complaint would be the breakfast was a bit skinny.

review.title: Friendly staff, good value
review.reviewText: Staff was quite helpful and friendly.  Room was reasonably quiet given proximity to major roads.  Breakfast was quite limited but as advertised.  No amenities here, no shuttle to the airport, but a good value for the money.

review.title: This place was wonderful!
review.reviewText: This was so nice, very clean, very quiet and the staff was so kind and helpful.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything! It was a beautiful hotel with great staff and amenities! Very clean!
review.negativeRemarks: I didnt see any room for improvement!
review.locationRemarks: It was close to where I took a class.

review.title: Pleasant stay
review.reviewText:
I was there for just one night and I had a comfortable stay. The owner is courteous and was able to adjust my reservation even though I had it booked for the next day even though the hotel was almost sold out. There are a lot of restaurants 1/2 mile away. 

Coffee in the room was not good but the one in the lobby is. Comes with a mini breakfast - some cereal, instant oats and fruits.  Overall I recommend this.
review.positiveRemarks: courtesy, neatness and close to airport
review.negativeRemarks: there is a bit of smell in the carpet
review.locationRemarks: lot of restaurants, close to airport.

review.reviewText: loved it. great !!!!!! clean, extra comfy , will stay here again.

review.title: 5 mins drive from AIRPORT, 15 mins walk to HERTZ
review.reviewText:
It is not the sexiest place on earth but if you're looking for really low cost motel size place majorly close to the airport then this is your ticket. It's situated in a slightly run down area but it's utterly safe (we were there for 4 days) constantly in and out and around late at night also with 2 small children.

It's within 10 mins walk of a great little downtown. You can get diners, vietnamese, chinese etc. and they're really decent quality.

It's run by an Indian family who are so sweet and helpful.  Their breakfast is not great but we went out for a hearty breakfast everyday anyway so it didn't matter.  It's not the savoy by any stretch of the imagination but it's safe, clean and has has fast-speed wifi.

Would definitely use them again!!
review.positiveRemarks: The family that run it plus the excellent wifi and proximity to a downtown thats walkable.
review.negativeRemarks: The carpets and breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Downtown with cheap diners, chinese and mexican food,

review.title: This was a no frills hotel.
review.reviewText: The bed was comfortable, the room was clean, there was a refrigerator and microwave.  It was in walking distance of several restuarants.  It was a low budget property.
review.positiveRemarks: Price was good for San Francisco area.
review.negativeRemarks: Better towels.
review.locationRemarks: Near airport and driving distance to San Francisco.

review.reviewText: Hotel was not bad for the price. Only issue I had was the bathroom smelled a little musty.

review.title: Good location, great rooms
review.reviewText: The rooms are in superb condition and the inn has private parking (with cctv). Close eating options available and good connections to the city. The only downside I can think of is the breakfast, which is just cereal, a banana and a danish with bad coffee. But that's not enough for me to take off points.

review.title: Cute, Quaint, Comfortable, Clean
review.reviewText: While staying at this wonderful hotel, I felt as if I was at home.

review.title: Very nice, clean hotel and close to SFO Airport
review.reviewText: This hotel had friendly staff and the rooms were clean and quiet.

review.title: Modern Convenience
review.reviewText: This is a family owned and operated business.  All modern conveniences and amenities necessary are provided, but in a relaxed and pleasant setting.  The property is also in close proximity to some long time established restaurants, like Buon Gusto's (Sicilian) on Grand Avenue, just a few blocks away, as well as the Basque Cultural Center (entrance on Railroad and Magnolia), which serves one of the best Cognac Pepper Steaks in the Bay Area!  I was born and raised, and still live, in San Francisco but stayed here with a friend from Indiana who had to fly home out of SFO after a few days' visit.
review.positiveRemarks: I felt like I was staying in the family's home; every time I ran into one of them, they would say hello to us, and us to them.

review.title: Exceeded my expectations
review.reviewText: Thank you for a great stay! I was a bit wary after reading the reviews, but I needed a place to stay for a few days in San Francisco and this one was great. We ended up getting there after 2 am in the morning due to a flight delay but the owner had absolutely no problems with it and gave us our room key quickly. Parking was super useful, a bit cramped, but we never had a problem finding a place to park in the covered lot for any of the three days we were there for. Room was larger than I expected with a sofa, huge bed, and desk, coffee tablet, dresser, etc. Everything was clean and the cleaning facilities were spot on each day. Breakfast was each morning with a variety of tea, coffee, fruits, packaged danishes, etc It was enough to get your day started and for the price, the hotel was great. Close by to the airport, they called us a taxi on the first day to go pick up our rental car which was great, and everything that we wanted to see was close by by car. Thanks again and would definitely recommend!
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness, room, comfort.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast

review.title: one night stay
review.reviewText: We stayed for one night after flying in from London.  The room was clean and well equiped.  The hotel staff were friendly advised on on places to go to eat in the evening.  The only downside is the area, which isnt very nice and I wouldnt wander around late at night.

review.title: Great place!
review.reviewText: We got a great accomodation. The place was clean, quiet and good location. We called for a non working equipment they responded and fix it right away.

review.title: Awesome place.
review.reviewText: Amazing staff. Best customer service. Clean rooms. Comfy beds. Super rad.

review.title: Affordable and nice
review.reviewText: Very good for a hotel of this type!   Clean and comfortable

review.title: Handy for airport
review.reviewText: Nice hotel with modern feel. Very close toSFO airport. Friendly, efficient staff.  Traffic noise slightly anoying. Breakfast was simply coffee juice and pastries to taket to room or patio.  Everything clean and comfortable. A good hotel if coming to or leaving from SFO.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything bu traffic noise
review.negativeRemarks: See above -triple glaze?

review.title: Good stay
review.reviewText: Ours was a good-sized room.  The refrigerator, microwave, iron, and hairdryer all got used, so their inclusion in the room was a big plus.  The location was very close to restaurants and shopping, as well as the freeway.  Not a big hotel, so it was easy to get from the room to the car, which was also a big plus.  The bed was comfortable.  And the staff were polite and helpful.  So overall, it worked out well.  I would just recommend that housekeeping dust the room thoroughly and make sure they leave the bathroom floors clean.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to freeway.  Quiet area. Comfortable bed.  Included microwave and refrigerator, as well as iron and hairdryer.  Big T.V.
review.negativeRemarks: Dust.  Lots of dust was visible on the light fixtures and around the television.  And they should clean the floor in the bathroom when housekeeping.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the freeway with restaurants & shopping just 2 blocks away.

review.title: acceptable
review.reviewText:
near to airport
considering room size and confort price is little high
review.positiveRemarks: staff are very kind
review.negativeRemarks:
breakfast food 
it is too simple food...

review.title: Stayed Two Nights
review.reviewText: Sam, the man working at the desk, helped get someone in the neighborhood to jump-start my car.
review.positiveRemarks: clean, comfortable, and safe. Card-key to enter hotel and room. Parking space/refrigerator/microwave/coffee maker/wifi access/personal bathroom
review.negativeRemarks: more room space for breakfast
review.locationRemarks: A bit of a way from downtown, but for the room price it is worthwhile--simply organize your day-trips to downtown

review.title: Clean and comfortable, great value.
review.reviewText: For the price, cant be beat. Only basic services, but spotlessly clean and comfortable. Staff very friendly and accommodating. Plenty of parking, no problem in and out. Close to airport, but only 15 minutes by car to Union Square (on the weekend - don't know what traffic is like on weekdays).
review.positiveRemarks: Spotlessly clean and new. Quaint courtyard directly accessable to all roooms
review.negativeRemarks: Free Continental breakfast. However no place to sit and need to carry food out on tray which is provided.
review.locationRemarks: Nothing much near by. Some restaurants within walking distance, mainly Italian. 10 minutes to airport car return and only 15 minutes to Union Square o

review.title: Nice hotel, confortable and clean
review.reviewText: Good experience!!!, it's a nice place, near to San Francisco at a reasonable price

review.title: Will get what you pay
review.reviewText:
One of the lowest rate in the SFO area, but you will get what you pay! Nice and clean room but other things are below the standard.

Services were also horrible. When we asked additional 2 towels, they only allowed one towel, which has to be picked up by the guest, not delivered by the room service. 

Still just OK for 1 night sleep. If you want to stay longer for visiting SF area, just pay more and find the better place.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean room.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast, it was pathetic... Better think that there is no free breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Near the airport. 10 min to drive.

review.title: Nice small family run hotel. Well kept and clean.
review.reviewText: Staff very helpful and seem to really care about your stay and the property. Right off the highway with a lot of road noise but once on the property or in your room very very quiet.

review.title: Great value
review.reviewText: The room was clean and comfortable. We were pleased with how well our family of five fit in the room. Great value in a convenient location near the airport.

review.title: nice stay!
review.reviewText: Good hotel for price, close to shopping , restaurants.

review.title: Good night's sleep!!!
review.reviewText: We were only there for 1 night, but were able to get a really good night's sleep! The manager was kind and employees were very friendly. The room was very clean as well as the bathroom. The hotel is close to a CAL-TRAIN which we took to the depot and a city bus down to Fisherman's Wharf & Pier 39, was great that we didn't have to drive in the downtown area. .  We would recommend this hotel and would visit again if  we are ever in the area again.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to the airport & Cal-Train with easy access to them.
review.negativeRemarks: The continental breakfast was not the greatest, but it really didn't matter to us.
review.locationRemarks: Location was great, especially for driving to the airport and Cal-Train.

review.title: Pleasant supprise
review.reviewText: We found the accommodation easy to find and were pleasantly surprised by the size of the rooms the facilities and the cleanliness. Would definitely stay there again.
review.positiveRemarks: Free breakfast which included cereals, fruit and pastries as well as hot drinks.
review.negativeRemarks: No
review.locationRemarks: Plenty of places to eat close by and location appears safe.

review.reviewText: Great for what it is - budget airport hotel. Staff was very friendly and helpful and room was comfortable. Would definitely stay here again!

review.title: Best value
review.reviewText: Staff were very friendly and helpful to direct you for where to take bus for San Fran and also for restaurant room was very spotless only thing was breakfast  not many varieties but overall excellent place to stay

review.title: Very decent place....
review.reviewText: Our stay in the hotel was great.  The room is very decent, clean and reasonable price.  The owner is very accommodating and friendly.  Their near to excellent rating is proven!  We will surely use this hotel again next time.

review.title: Convenient location and quiet rooms
review.reviewText:
We stayed in the hotel on our way back to San Francisco Airport.  It is only a 15 min ride to the airport. The room was large and quiet, our car could be parked on the upper deck of the hotel close to the room. Staff was very helpful and very friendly. 
We would definetely stay there again if we needed accomodations close to the airport.

review.title: Perfect airport hotel
review.reviewText: Great hotel within close proximity to the airport. Stayed in an upstairs room and would highly reccomend you do the same.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport.
review.reviewText: About 10 mins away from the airport. The rooms are clean, and are great at blocking out noise. Pretty decent beds, can get humid but the rooms have air conditioner, and heat if you get cold. There are tons of little restaurants about 4 blocks away so finding a place to eat was never a problem. It takes about 30min to get to downtown SF/Pier 39 using the highway.
Quick, pleasant experience... I'd stay there again. A little close to the freeway, but not a bad trade-of!

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: very nice especialy  for the price.  Family owned and operated.  Nice people.

It is a small motel near the airport. There is a two story parking garage which is at no charge for the guests. The check in process was fast and smooth. The hotel staff was very friendly. We got the suite with a Jacuzzi tub and they explained how to operate the tub. The room was just like the picture. We had the fan on in the room all night. It wasn't noisy and made the room a perfect temperature. Outside our room on the first floor there is a courtyard with a cute little water fountain and tables and chairs. It was a comfortable and relaxing place to stay.
review.positiveRemarks: The room was nice and quiet. There was an adorable little courtyard on the first level with a water fountain. It had a nice, cozy feeling.
review.negativeRemarks: The bed wasn't the greatest but I have definitely experienced worse. Its a standard bed, but the pillows were super comfy.
review.locationRemarks: Located close to the airport, with traffic it takes a good 40 minutes to get to downtown SF.

review.reviewText: GREAT STAY! EVERYTIME I GO BACK TO SF WILL STAY HERE! GREAT RATE! GREAT ROOM! GREAT HOTEL. LOVED IT, FLET LIKE HOME.

review.title: Good option for San Francisco Airport
review.reviewText:
I din't know what to expect because I chose this Inn because the price was right. On arrival, the general look of the Inn left me wondering about my choice. As soon as I checked-in and saw my room, whatever doubts I had, vanished. Nice, clean room. Within easy walking distance from nice local restaurants.
The manage was quite helpful in recommending reaturant options.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness and proximity to loca restaurants. Proximity to San Francisco airport. The help given by the manager.
review.negativeRemarks: Having a shared shuttle to the airport
review.locationRemarks: Easy to go to local restaurants (italian food and japanese) to mention only two

review.title: Fine for a budget motel
review.reviewText: It was two cuts above a Motel 6.  Everything was in good shape
review.positiveRemarks: Good location, good price, clean, free parking
review.negativeRemarks: Quality of the TV (pooer picture); window security--add stops to allow keeping it partly open; add clothes hooks in the closet
review.locationRemarks: Near SFO.  Near many dinner restaurants.

review.reviewText: Hotel was in very good condition, rooms were very clean & comfortable. Location is quite convenient to the airport but is a bit noisy in the AM being next to the 101 Fwy

review.title: Planes constantly flying over hotel--loud
review.reviewText: No complaints about hotel with the exception of the location. Planes constantly flying over hotel--loud.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and nice bathroom

review.title: Very Satisfied with overall service
review.reviewText: We had a short stay at this hotel but was impressed with it vicinity to the airport.  The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly.  The room was very attractive and comfortable.  We would definitely stay again if we are ever in the area again.
review.positiveRemarks: No complaints whatsoever
review.locationRemarks: The airport and the car rental return are very near.   There are also a few nice places to eat and mall close.

review.title: The the worst hotel I've ever lived in US.
review.reviewText:
It's the the worst hotel I've ever lived in US. 
The staff are Horrible, always deadpan, as if you owe their money. 
The hotel is close to the US - 101 so it's quite noisy. The room sound insulation effect is very poor, may be due to some guests take the evening flight, I had been woken up several times at night. 
WOULD NEVER BE THERE AGAIN.
review.positiveRemarks: Never

review.title: The worst hotel I've ever lived in US.
review.reviewText:
It's the the worst hotel I've ever lived in US. 
The staff are Horrible, always deadpan, as if you owe their money. 
The hotel is close to the US - 101 so it's quite noisy. The room sound insulation effect is very poor, may be due to some guests take the evening flight, I had been woken up several times at night. 
WOULD NEVER BE THERE AGAIN.
review.positiveRemarks: Never.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing, because I don't think the face and the words of the stuff has the will to change.

review.title: Simple, clean hotel for overnight stays
review.reviewText: Needed a reasonably-priced place to stay overnight and this place was perfect. Looks like it has been recently renovated so the room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Easy check-in and check-out with plenty of parking. Ammenities are basic but it suited my needs.
review.negativeRemarks: It was nice to see a mini-fridge in my room, but it was not cold enough to keep perishable items like milk and yogurt at a healthy temperature.
review.locationRemarks: Places to eat nearby and easy access to the freeway.

review.title: stayed for 2 days
review.reviewText: very good room and great furnishing, owner very obliging, was in good position for buses into the city, with great local shopping and restaurants in close proximity very reasonable rate with breakfast included
review.positiveRemarks: everything was great
review.locationRemarks: good location with good public transport

review.title: Want to get "Ripped Off"; stay at THIS hotel?
review.reviewText:
If you don't mind being treated like a second class citizen or like you are imposing on someone to do their job, then you will be just fine. Customer service is not in the owner/manager's vocabulary. He was not concerned about customer satisfaction in the least as he knows most people are only there for a one time stay since it is near the airport.

We have stayed in many hotels throughout our lives and have NEVER been so disgusted by our overall experience. First of all, we made our reservations for three people; two adults and one fourteen year old child. We reserved a room with one king size bed and one hide a bed couch. When we arrived, he told us it would be an additional fee if we wanted sheets for the hide a bed; WOW never heard of such a thing! We made reservations to accommodate the three of us and EXPECTED accommodations for three; which should include sheets and towels for all of us. It was a bait & switch scheme. We are extremely disappointed that not only did he try to manipulate us out of an additional fee, he treated us like 2nd class citizens! 

He was the rudest person who has absolutely NO business running a business. He acted as though he was doing us a FAVOR by allowing us to stay there. I would plead with anyone NOT to stay at this hotel and support such a disrespectful individual and his establishment. We will NEVER be back!
review.positiveRemarks: Near SFO airport
review.negativeRemarks: The owner/manager should attend a class on "How to treat customers properly". We would suggest gaining some personal relations skills.
review.locationRemarks: SFO airport

review.title: Clean, comfy,close to airport.
review.reviewText: Conveniently located near the airport. Clean and comfortable hotel with everything we needed. Staff were not particularly friendly when we arrived, but otherwise a good hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfy and clean.
review.negativeRemarks: Staff member was somewhat unfriendly on arrival.
review.locationRemarks: Good location for airport.

review.title: Great place to stay!
review.reviewText: Manager very helpful regarding area, rooms very nice, clean and spacious! Towels large and plush. Security cameras on property, feel safe. We had an early tour departure and he opened the breakfast nook early! Eating places walking distance

review.title: Best value and return
review.reviewText: Just spent one night near the airport here. It was very competitively priced and well worth it. Great for the price
Rooms were clean and comfy. And really quiet even with being near the freeway
review.positiveRemarks: Very clean and updated
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport, easy access to the freeway

review.title: Good for the price.
review.reviewText: The hotel was nice and clean.  The manager was helpful.  There are good food options nearby. The bus is handy to the airport or to San Francisco.

review.title: Inexpensive hotel near airport.
review.reviewText: We easily found the hotel on Airport Rd., and drove right into their free parking. The gentleman at the desk was courteous and efficient in checking us in. The flower boxes and quaint courtyard were welcoming and immaculate. Our rooms were very clean and comfortable. There are many restaurants within easy walking distance from the hotel, and the neighborhood is safe and well-kept.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel and very closed to the airport. Clean room and very good value for money.

The bathroom shower had dry shampoo that made me feel like the room was not cleaned properly. The bed was very comfortable. The pictures on expedia look like the rooms are a lot bigger but they are not. They are much smaller than they look. I didn't even get the continental breakfast because the lobby was so small to get anything. Customer service was terrible. Not friendly at all! I really liked the parking upstairs that that was secluded but I would have liked it if it had a gate.

review.title: quite hotel for rest with family...
review.reviewText: This is a quite hotel perfect to rest out of the big San Francisco city, small but cleaned. There's not installation for taking a good breakfast but have coffee and juice for free.
review.positiveRemarks: that is small and rooms are quite good.
review.negativeRemarks: some rooms smell of smoke and need a place to take meals...
review.locationRemarks: all is near but of-course you need a car

review.title: a clean& quiet hotel
review.reviewText: it is clean and quiet, the staffs here are very nice. I like my stay here
review.positiveRemarks: clean& quiet

review.title: A few  days of stay
review.reviewText:
The hotel was, clean and I was surprised to see the room equipped with a mini fridge, iron & board along with a microwave so that came in handy. 

Our overall stay was comfortable.

review.title: Small Room & Wet Carpet
review.reviewText: The room was small and the carpet was wet. We couldn't take off our shoes. Very noisy due to traffic. Lite continental breakfast...not good at all. Parking stalls are too narrow. It was hard to get in and out of our vehicle. I guess you get what you pay for.
review.positiveRemarks: Cute tiny courtyard.
review.locationRemarks: We went to Candlestick Park for the "Legends of Candlestick" flag football game.

review.reviewText: Had a comfortable stay, felt safe, adequate parking
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable queen size beds, quiet when inside the room, decent breakfast provisions
review.negativeRemarks: Faster bath tub drainage
review.locationRemarks: Close to San Francisco airport

review.title: Close to San Francisco airport
review.reviewText: We arrived late due to a delayed flight, and had to check in through a window; it made me think that we weren't in a good area of town, however the staff was friendly enough.  Room was quiet and clean and looked as though it had some recent updates. Bed was very comfortable; flat screen TV, and small living area.  Appeared clean, and offered a basic continental breakfast, i.e. cereal, fruit, packaged Danish, and coffee.

review.title: Quality for the money you pay
review.reviewText:
Knowing what this chain hotel looks like on average I was pleasantly surprised when I entered the room. It was clean and it looked like a 4 star hotel room. I chose this hotel based off the reviews it has and I was not dissapointed at all but my wife and I felt very comfy in there.
On top of it, in the morning when I checked out, the guy at the front desk (which might be the owner) helped me to pay the fast track for Golden Gate bridge - no more cash accepted so you have to pay it online. He was very helpful with directions and went above his job description.

review.title: Much better than "basic budget"
review.reviewText: I often seek a room that's clean and comfortable, but also a bargain -- so I've got lots of experience with the "basic budget" category. Many chains now offering wi-fi, bed, perhaps some coffee or modest breakfast. Well, this was a cut above the others, certainly above the other ABVI I've visited. The room was clean, etc. but I was really surprised by the quality of the furnishings in the room -- pillows and comforter typical of a much pricier hotel. And Sam, the owner/manager, went out of his way to advise me regarding transportation to the nearby BART station. I get the sense that he really wants to make his property attractive and keep things maintained well. And there are excellent diners nearby. The neighborhood (I walked in the mornings), while not Beverly Hills, is solid, working folk. I really liked this experience.

review.title: Know Where You're Going
review.reviewText: Nice Place - The owner bought it in 2008 and he definitely takes a personal interest in the place. First, make sure you've written down the address and have the phone number ready. Most of the cabbies and the shuttle people will argue with you and insist that it is "downtown" San Francisco. There IS one downtown but this one is close to the airport - just a little farther than the usual HoJo Express and Sheraton etc. Tell the driver that it is North of GRAND AVE. and there will be no problem. I took a shuttle there for $17 but when I realized how close it was, I took a cab when I returned to the airport. Cab was $15.80. So - the best part (aside form the clean hotel) is that you can walk 6 blocks and turn right on Grand to enjoy Vietnamese food, Thai food, Mexican food, Italian food etc., etc. and they are all small town places - just neighborhood dining and good fare. That being said, it's a clean neighborhood but still a diverse neighborhood. I wouldn't hang around much past 10:30 or so. Go back to the hotel and have a cocktail in the small but quite nice courtyard.
review.positiveRemarks: It was clean and the owner takes pride in his service.
review.negativeRemarks: Well - there's no shuttle but, whatever - the cab ride isn't much and you don't have to WAIT for the shuttle !
review.locationRemarks: The restaurants are quite nice.. I've stayed on the other side of the freeway (at HoJo's) and it was expensive and not near as good.

review.title: Good hotel, very convenient located
review.reviewText: Nice rooms, good shower, I would definitely recommend this hotel to my friends.

review.title: Very nice hotel on main route into San Francisco
review.reviewText: We spent two separate visits during our 2 week holiday and was very happy with their being car parking and on the main route for both the city centre and the airport. There was a limited but perfectly acceptable breakfast and the room was very clean. The staff were very helpful with any questions we had concerning getting about etc
review.locationRemarks: Also close to some local shops and on main bus route (292).

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Affordable, friendly staff, nice comfortable cozy room

review.title: Great stay!
review.reviewText: This gem exceeded my expectations for a budget hotel at a reasonable rate. The room was extremely clean and tidy, nicely renovated and continental breakfast was a nice touch. The front desk gentleman was very helpful, polite and accommodating. If I ever need a room near the city, I will not hesitate to book here again. Plenty of parking. One point on the comfort is the bed was a bit firm for my liking but certainly not a deterrent.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff, room cleanliness and newer renos.
review.locationRemarks: Short drive to Millbrae station to use Bart or Caltrain.

review.title: Small but very nice.
review.reviewText: Love the rooms. Have stayed here before. No closet though. Manager very friendly and welcoming. Not a great continental breakfast. Barely adequate.

review.title: Served its purpose
review.reviewText: We stayed her on our last night in San Fran as we had an early flight to catch. The sheets didn't seem clean (stray hairs, tiny blood stains), so my husband slept in clothes. The area seemed kinda deserted, but we did find a nice Italian restaurant a few blocks down, on Grand. We were given the room closest to the parking garage. Crummiest room by far. Im not sure if that because we booked throigh expedia or not. We could hear all the horns from people locking their doors. For the price, I gess I shouldn't expect much. But it was more like what we'd get for $59 bucks a night where I come from.

review.title: only slept there
review.reviewText: walked in and immediately saw two types of insects in the tub, washed them down as didnt tell my wife hoping she wont find any more, towels were cheap, toilet paper was scarce, found bits if hair on sheets i didnt think we're mine

review.title: Nice room
review.reviewText: Inside the room very nice, the furniture is in good condition. Even though we got road view, our room was quiet. urtain in the bathroom was smelly, so it had not been washed. Good hotel for one night stay only

review.title: Fantastic for an airport hotel!
review.reviewText:
Stayed at this hotel/motel for one night after arriving at SFO, for what it is, great value! The manager was courteous and very kind, I had a van that had automatic headlights which turn off after a couple of minutes, and he actually called our room to remind us that theheadlights were still on!
The bed was big and comfy, and a large tv even though we didnt use it. Would definitely stay here again if we needed to find a place close to the airport! :)
review.positiveRemarks: location, staff, value!
review.locationRemarks: close to the airport, about a five minute drive. near the freeway but was very quiet

review.title: Clean, Strong WIFI, good for business travellers
review.reviewText: Surprisingly lovely rooms, clean, nice upgraded facilities. Excellent wifi, and good desk and outlets for working on a laptop. And there's a refrigerator and microwave in the room. The neighborhood is less than desireable, so this place is not for walking around, but once inside the door you feel transported to a far swankier place. You would never know from viewing from the street how really (really!) nice the rooms are. This goes in my "hidden gem" category. Great for business travel. Due to location this is not a romantic destination.

review.title: Outstanding property, great price
review.reviewText: This motel exceeded all expectations. The owner/manager is efficient and helpful, and runs a very tight ship. The room was beautiful and the bed perfect. Convenient to the city yet in a quiet and safe location. The inner courtyard is intimate and charming. This gets my highest recommendation for a budget motel.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing

review.title: Small nice family run motel
review.reviewText: Nicely decorated, clean, competent staff. Breakfast not the best as one had to take whatever food was available back to the room as there is no breakfast room. If in the area I would stay there again.
Very satisfied..just hope breakfast served earlier than 7am...Place clean.

review.title: Comfortable Stay
review.reviewText: Spend one night there, to catch an early flight at the airport the next morning. Slept very comfortable. very quiet area, and free parking. Place is not that bad for the price. Staff was friendly. I did enjoy it.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable bed and quiet for a good night sleep.
review.negativeRemarks: Furniture needs an upgrade.
review.locationRemarks: Did not have much time to look around.

review.title: Surprisingly wonderful hotel
review.reviewText: The exterior of this hotel did not look like anything special, however; the rooms were large and immaculate. Staff was extremely courteous, and the price was not bad at all. There was a charming courtyard area in the middle of the property. We would definitely choose this hotel again for a trip to S San Francisco, CA.
review.positiveRemarks: Price, size of rooms, and cleanliness
review.negativeRemarks: Smoking was allowed only in the garage. It would have been nice to be able to relax in courtyard to smoke.
review.locationRemarks: Airport So. San Francisco, CA

review.title: Great hotel
review.reviewText: stayed there of 5 days. the rooms were very clean. the bathrooms were clean. the , hotel was quiet so sleep was not a problem. the staff was helpful and courteous. they cleaned our rooms everyday. the neighborhood was very nice, just two blocks away was a nice Italian restaurant called cicilias with great food. there is also parking for the customers. that was very useful sine we rented a small car. our stay was from 11/6-11/11. great place to stay when visiting san francisco
review.positiveRemarks: clean rooms, clean bathrooms. friendly staff, free parking
review.negativeRemarks: nothing
review.locationRemarks: nice location. very quiet place, two blocks away many shops and restaurants. , never felt unsafe...

review.title: Convenient Place, 20 minutes drive from downtown
review.reviewText: I stayed for two nights at this place on a business trip. I received very courteous service and I was surprised at the appearance of my room - for what I was paying, it was nice. I just wanted a quiet, clean place to sleep at night that wouldnt cost a ton. I felt I got a good deal and I would stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Free parking, courteous staff. The hotel doesn't have very many units and I found it to be quiet at night.
review.negativeRemarks: There was some dust (on top of tv, mirror, headboard) and there were some cracks in the molding in need of repair. Breakfast area is a bit too crowded

review.title: Great value, beautiful room, nice breakfast, great
review.reviewText: Chose because close to airport. Found owner to be proud of his hotel & wants it to be outstanding and we found it to be superior! Many thanks for such a nice room.

review.title: Not conveniently located but clean
review.reviewText: There is no shuttle to/from the airport to this hotel. The cab driver had trouble finding it. The fare should be under $20 though if the cabbie knows where they are going. Not much in the way of services but the staff was friendly and helpful. Likely wouldn't stay again because of location and lack of services nearby. Not having shuttles makes the cheap rate less of a bargain ($40 to get a cab downtown unless you want to navigate the bus). However if you just want somewhere to sleep prior to getting on a plane the next day it is okay.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and cheap
review.negativeRemarks: A map of nearby restaraunts and coffee shops.
review.locationRemarks: Nothing nearby

review.title: Better than expected
review.reviewText: For the price I thought the hotel would be ok. It exceeded my expectations by far. It was a very nice hotel.

review.title: Excellent value for money
review.reviewText: This was an excellent choice for a stay of two nights. The hotel is easy to find and has parking on two levels making it easy to transport luggage to your room. The cost per night compares very favourably to hotels in Fisherman's Wharf.
review.positiveRemarks: Parking, fridge and microwave in room, free parking and easy access to our room. The manager was very helpful.
review.negativeRemarks: Pillows and mattress.
review.locationRemarks: Good access to the airport. Shops and eating places within walking distance or a short drive away. Easy access to Fisherman's Wharf by car.

review.title: I give this hotel 5 star everything is perfect.
review.reviewText: It was quite nice hotel and worth of staying for a night.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean
review.locationRemarks: the employees are nice

review.title: Nice hotel close to Airport
review.reviewText: Very nice. The hotel was great and very well priced.
review.positiveRemarks: Very clean room! Very Friendly and helpful staff.
review.negativeRemarks: The bed could be softer.
review.locationRemarks: Close to many restaurants.

review.title: Great hotel for cheap price
review.reviewText: This hotel is kept up very well and was clean. The price was one of the cheapest around and has easy on and off to hwy 101. It doesn't have a lot of the niceties as the more expensive hotels, such as nice towels, but it did have a microwave and refrigerator in our room. For the price and location, this hotel is a good recommendation.

review.title: HORRIBLE
review.reviewText: Horrible staff, bed was hard as a rock, shower curtain smelt like mildew. DONT STAY HERE

review.title: 24 hour layover-very comfortable accommodation.
review.reviewText: My daughter and I had 24 hours to stay before we headed onward on another long flight. We arrived late to check in to a very comfortable and VERY CLEAN room which was great. Our room was right on the street. I was worried it might be too loud, but surprisingly it was not a problem. The room was spacious for us, had a nice sofa, excellent TV facilities, etc. We had a very comfortable stay-since most of the 24 hours was spent in our room recovering before our next long haul flight.
review.positiveRemarks: The cleanliness of the rooms, the friendliness of the hotel staff and the close vicinity to the airport.
review.negativeRemarks: For the price of the rooms, I found it really good value. Perhaps just have a local map in the room with nearby restaurants & food chains are located
review.locationRemarks: Very close to the airport. There is a street nearby which has restaurants, some good coffee shops and a small supermarket.

review.title: Conveniently located close to the airport.
review.reviewText: Accommodations were clean and sufficient for an affordable night in SF including free parking, internet, and limited breakfast.
review.positiveRemarks: Front desk staff was very helpful.
review.negativeRemarks: Free continental breakfast was very limited.

review.title: very close to highway and downtown SF
review.reviewText: excellent hotel. great host. very friendly. rooms were very clean and well maintained. internet is free.

review.title: Exceptional value for SF area
review.reviewText: Very clean and pleasant. Our room had excellent wi-fi. Parking available for both first and second floors. Friendly staff. At $117 it was an exceptional value for the SF area. BART station is a 5-minute drive, then 20 minutes to Embarcadero station.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and pleasant

review.title: Nice place to stay if you are passing through.
review.reviewText: This hotel was very clean and comfortable. My room had a microwave and small refrigerator, which is always nice, and a new flatscreen tv.The room was very clean and had a nice amount of space. Free wifi was available and worked very well, full bars on my tablet. There was a cute courtyard area in the center of the hotel with tables and chairs which i thought was a nice touch. The place doesn't have a lot of rooms, its a fairly small hotel so getting to your car or the office or vending machines is a very short walk from any room. There are a fair amount of restaurants within walking distance. I would recommend this hotel if you are just passing through or have business in san francisco and don't plan on doing any sightseeing or spending a lot of time in the city, it is not really close to anything of interest.
review.positiveRemarks: Very clean rooms and very clean outside, free wifi, walking distance to restaraunts.
review.locationRemarks: The downtown area of south san francisco is close by with plenty of places to eat, not much else to do without getting on a bus or taking a drive.

review.title: Nice~
review.reviewText: Less expectation, more satisfaction. The location was perfect!!! Next time I will stay again definitely!!!

review.title: Good value and good location
review.reviewText:
This is a small hotel. Good location in South San Francisco and right off the freeway.
The room have been updated and they are well decorated.
review.locationRemarks: We went to a Giants game and this hotel was very convient to catch CalTrans to the stadium.

review.title: Convenient to San Francisco Airport
review.reviewText: This hotel is very clean and convenient to the airport. The hotel staff was extremely helpful, courteous and professional.The Indoor parking is a plus. I would defifnitely recommend this hotel to friends and family who have an early flight out of SFO.
review.positiveRemarks: Helpfulness of staff
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient to airport

review.title: Brand new and very comfortble.
review.reviewText: it was very comfortable and clean .also quit.security was excellent .stff was very friendly.but the only thing that needs replacing is the pillows .need better quality and firmer pillows.but it is a great place to rest .will return thank you .
review.positiveRemarks: it was new and felt like i was in an hi end apartment.very clean will return.
review.negativeRemarks: pillows to soft .need firmer pillows and a waffle maker for breakfast an d hard boiled eggs.
review.locationRemarks: location is very well .resturants are nearby on grand ave.

review.title: Great value for money & 5 minutes from SFO airport
review.reviewText: I had to stay for 1 night in San Francisco, and after a lot of search I decided to book at Americas Best Value Inn. First of all I was afraid from the hotel appearance. But when I checked in eveything were different. Clean room with very high speed wifi and a refrigerator in the room, also the bathroom seems to be newly renewed. So tge room itself looks like 4 stars hotel. But don't expect a fancy breakfast or hotel facilities. It is just a great room near to the airport for 1 or 2 nights. Highly recommended.
review.locationRemarks: 5 min from SFO airport with a near gas station.

review.title: Great for the price!
review.reviewText: Very friendly staff and comfortable room. Would definitely stay here again.

review.title: Good airport choice.
review.reviewText: Small clean hotel convenient for airport. Small courtyard to sit in to read paper/have complimentary breakfast, when weather suitable. Friendly, helpful manager. Convenient walking distance to local restaurants etc to avoid pricey downtown venues. Busy road nearby could be a problem depending on room.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenient for airport, train or bus to downtown.
review.negativeRemarks: Busy road nearby.
review.locationRemarks: Quite industrial on main road, but location becomes safe/residential one block in.

review.title: Great Value for your money
review.reviewText: I was looking for a motel near the airport for a quick overnight stay. I read most reviews of the motels near the airport and America's Best Value Inn had everything I was looking for. Close to the airport, good value for the money, clean and comfortable, friendly staff, lots of parking. Other motels closer to areas like Fishermans Wharf were double the money and also charged $25 - $40 to park overnight. The drive from this motel to Fisherman's Wharf only took 30 minutes and I paid $10 to park for 3 hours. With the money I saved I had a wonderful dinner and shopped for gifts for my family. I will definately stay here again on my next visit to San Francisco
review.positiveRemarks: Great price, clean room and free parking.
review.negativeRemarks: A bit of traffic noise but not enough to worry about.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport. Easy access if arriving late or flying out early in the morning.

review.title: Affordable room close to everything
review.reviewText: There are only 20 rooms which I liked because I didn't have to worry about parking or noise. There is a area in the middle of the rooms with small tables to be able to enjoy coffee in the mornings. The rooms were kept up but I was disappointed that it needed to be dusted better. But the beds were very comfortable and I was even able to walk around in white socks and my socks didn't turn black.My family stayed 3 nights and we felt safe. I would stay there again. Downfall is not to many eating places around Hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Free parking, Free wi-fi
review.negativeRemarks: Desk in room to big for the room
review.locationRemarks: Location was easy to get to but not to much around the area

review.title: The good, the bad and...the mostly good.
review.reviewText: The room as clean and bed-bug free except for the shower which had a bit of mildew on it. Parking was free and the manager even let my friend park there as we toured the city. Don't expect much for breakfast, even though it is free; there is coffee, cereal, juice, danishes and some small apples. Very close to the airport, very easy to find even though you have to travel through the whole city if you are coming from the north. The staff was very nice and courteous. The rooms and the hotel in general could stand a remodel, but everything worked and no real issues were noted.

review.title: nice hotel to stay,
review.reviewText: close to the airport, clean and comfortable, nice staff, close to dinning place.
review.positiveRemarks: clean and close to the airport.
review.negativeRemarks: none.
review.locationRemarks: close to the airport and easy to find place to eat.

review.reviewText: Hotel was clean, staff very friendly and helpful, easy to get to from airport for overnight stopover.
review.negativeRemarks: Not close to any grocery stores or conveniences
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport, handy for overnight stopover between flights

review.title: good place to stay
review.reviewText:
clean & quiet, close to airport, good service
furnishings old but adequate

review.title: Our three day get-a-way in SF...
review.reviewText: My wife and I spent three days/two nights at this hotel. We really enjoyed our stay. The front desk (Sam) was very helpful. He answered any questions we had and welcomed us to the hotel. We stayed in a single King-sized bed room. We were very comfortable and enjoyed having all of the amenities that were include with the room (cable tv, microwave, refrigerator, and menus for delivery services in the area). The room didn't have high-tech/over the top things in it. However, everything worked and the room service was great. The location itself is kind of fat from downtown/all of the SF tourist attractions. But, if you were to rent a car from the airport (like we did) this location is perfect and a great value. If not, the So SF Caltrain station is walking distance from the hotel (0.5 mile).
review.positiveRemarks: Vehicle parking specifically designated for the hotel guests.
review.locationRemarks: Far from tourists attractions but close to the airport and Caltrain.

review.title: Loud and dirty
review.reviewText: The online reviews said the hotel was good for the money. The carpet was dreadfully filthy, the bedspreads looked as if they hadn't been washed in months, and the bathroom was also dirty. It was one of those places that you just felt like it wouldn't be soon enough to get out. Also, very loud near highways to the airport - woke up many times to loud trucks and other loud sounds.
review.negativeRemarks: Loud and dirty

review.title: dont ever stay here
review.reviewText: BED BUGS- i Had to sanitize everything before bringing it back into my house

review.title: Very good value for money
review.reviewText: Room was very clean; bed was very comfortable!, free Wifi, free parking, free breakfast; excellent value for money; location is great, because of 15-20 min to SF and 10 min to Bay Area

review.title: True Value
review.reviewText: Really comfortable hotel. Quiet, pleasant, no-frills atmosphere, and a very welcoming reception. Front desk person was friendly and accomodating. I couldn't imagine finding a better hotel for the price. Definitely recommended to anyone who will be visiting the area.

review.title: One of South San Francisco's Best Hotel
review.reviewText: Really friendly front desk agent. Absolutely love the exeperience and hospitality that I got from the hotel staff. Will definitely come back when can. Thank you so much for the best experience and help from the hotel.

review.title: not clean
review.reviewText: hair left in shower and toilet
